#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
pair<int, string> solve(int c1, int c2, int c3, string mid)
{
	string ans;
	for (int i = 0; i < c1 / 2; ++ i) ans += "aa";
	for (int i = 0; i < c3; ++ i) ans += "ab";
	for (int i = 0; i < c2 / 2; ++ i) ans += "bb";
	ans += mid;
	for (int i = 0; i < c2 / 2; ++ i) ans += "bb";
	for (int i = 0; i < c3; ++ i) ans += "ba";
	for (int i = 0; i < c1 / 2; ++ i) ans += "aa";
	return make_pair(- ((int) ans.length()), ans);
}
int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int T;
	cin >> T;
	while (T --)
	{
		int n;
		cin >> n;
		int c1 = 0, c2 = 0, c3 = 0, c4 = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++ i)
		{
			string c;
			cin >> c;
			if (c == "aa") c1 ++;
			if (c == "bb") c2 ++;
			if (c == "ab") c3 ++;
			if (c == "ba") c4 ++;
		}
		c3 = min(c3, c4);
		pair<int, string> ans = make_pair(0, "");
		if (c1) ans = min(ans, solve(c1 - 1, c2, c3, "aa"));
		if (c2) ans = min(ans, solve(c1, c2 - 1, c3, "bb"));
		ans = min(ans, solve(c1, c2, c3, ""));
		cout << ans.second << endl;
	}
}
